snippet: With a guess on a changeup, the local kid from the St. Louis suburb of Wildwood earned a lasting place in Cardinals history.
lead_paragraph: With a guess on a changeup, the local kid from the St. Louis suburb of Wildwood earned a lasting place in Cardinals history.

headline.main: Freese Earns a Place in Cardinals History
headline.print_headline: Freese Is Most Valuable, and Most Improbable
headline.seo: World Series — Freese Earns a Place in Cardinals History
